price: Na kae εberε a Soro abͻfoͻ no kaa sε: “Mar’yam, Onyankopͻn ayi wo, ate wo ho, εna W’ayi wo ama woso akyεn wiase mu mmaa no nyinaa”.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafāki waṭahharaki wa-iṣ'ṭafāki ʿalā nisāi al-ʿālamīna
